input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Campaign Data Synchronization

I am facing difficulties with the synchronization of my campaign data You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. The sync process has failed, and I believe there might be an issue with the API connection. I attempted to restart the server and double-check my credentials, but the problem still exists. Can you please help resolve this issue? My name is Omar Hassan.
